title: Smoking Hot! Ranveer Singh’s Photoshoot With Esquire Magazine
text: tweet Ranveer Singh is one of the most sought after actor in Bollywood currently. The actor has graced the cover of Esquire magazine for the month of January. He was chosen as the International man of the year by the magazine and hence made it to the cover. In his Padmavati look, Ranveer looks absolutely hot. In the photoshoot carried out by the magazine, Ranveer is seen in various looks. Check out the pictures here: Ranveer Singh On The Cover Page Of Esquire Smoking Hot!
